highlights: Fixed repeated YOLO banner failures by forcing GEMINI_SANDBOX=false for Hora-claw Gemini calls unless explicitly overridden.
Kept strict --yolo mode and improved Gemini output parsing/noise filtering so users no longer see banner text as the main error.
Improved shutdown reliability with bounded Telegram send timeouts and forced-exit protection to prevent stuck processes after Ctrl+C.
Updated npm start to run without bot.log redirection locks; optional logging remains available via npm run start:log.
